Template.SubjectPart: [Bitcoin Fee Alert {{date}}]: Fees greater than {{LOW_FEE}} sats/byte
Template.HtmlPart:
This is a bitcoin fee alert.


Fees on the bitcoin network are currently greater than {{LOW_FEE}} sats/byte but still below {{HIGH_FEE}} sats/byte. If any transactions are not urgent, you might consider waiting until they drop back down below {{LOW_FEE}} sats/byte.

Current Network Statistics:

Fee estimate for 1 hour confirmation: {{hourFee}} sats/byte.
Stuck/dropped transaction fee level: {{minimumFee}} sats/byte (don't send any transactions with fees less than this!)

To update your preferences or unsubscribe visit this link:
{{profileUrl}}
Template.TextPart:
This is a bitcoin fee alert.
Fees on the bitcoin network are currently greater than {{LOW_FEE}} sats/byte but still below {{HIGH_FEE}} sats/byte. If any transactions are not urgent, you might consider waiting until they drop back down below {{LOW_FEE}} sats/byte.
 
Current Network Statistics: 
Fee estimate for 1 hour confirmation: {{hourFee}} sats/byte.
Stuck/dropped transaction fee level: {{minimumFee}} sats/byte (don't send any transactions with fees less than this!)

To update your preferences or unsubscribe visit this link: 
{{profileUrl}}
